summary: I recently shared how I set up Packer to build Proxmox templates in my homelab.  That post covered storing (and retrieving) environment-specific values in Vault, the cloud-init configuration for defining the installation parameters, the various post-install scripts for further customizing and hardening the template, and the Packer template files that tie it all together.  By the end of the post, I was able to simply run...
title: Automate Packer Builds with GithHub Actions

summary: 😵‍💫 What a year this past week has been

I've been using Proxmox in my homelab for a while now, and I recently expanded the environment with two HP Elite Mini 800 G9 computers.  It was time to start automating the process of building and maintaining my VM templates.  I already had functional Packer templates for VMware↗ so I used that as a starting point for the Proxmox builds↗...
title: Building Proxmox Templates with Packer
